div.p: Country average δ 13C CH4-ruminant in 2000s, and the changes in δ 13C CH4-ruminant between 1960s and 2000s (∆ (δ 13C CH4-ruminant)). The ∆ (δ 13C CH4-ruminant) is here calculated from the diet shift only (i.e., changes in the relative C3–C4 fraction in feeds) without accounting for decreasing δ 13C CO2-atm incorporated in the biomass of grazed plants (see Methods). A positive ∆ (δ 13C CH4-ruminant) indicates an increase of δ 13C CH4-ruminant from 1960s to 2000s from a higher fraction of C4 in the diet
